Translations.Text: Tasurep, Nessader ip id, Neeppem ip id; Nessader ed, degs, issekniyen iberrzen, amar a d temmektim
Tin ne$ win iznan, jekwvet, yal yiwen segsen, tawinest iberdan; ur kwen p$aven $ef udem n Oebbi, ma tellam tumnem s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru. Arbaa n lmumnin, ad yili d anagi uaaqeb nnsen
Win iznan ur ippa$ siwa tin iznan, ne$ tamcarekt. Tin iznan ur p ippa$ siwa win iznan, ne$ amcarek. Ipwagdel waya i lmumnin
Wid itehmen tiaaoviyin, d$a ur d bbwin kue inagan, jekwvet pen iamet iberdan; ur qeblet ccada nnsen, d awez$i. Widen d iballa$en
Kkes ed wid isteooaen, deffir waya, u xedmen lfayeq. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Wid itehmen tilawin nnsen, ur sain inagan, siwa iman nnsen, yiwen segsen ad iggal s Oebbi, kue iberdan, ar neppa d bab n tidep
akked ubrid wis smus ar a t Ixzu Oebbi ma iskaddeb
Ur teppuaaqeb tmeiiut, ma teggul s Oebbi, kue iberdan, ar neppa seg wid iskadben
akked ubrid, wis smus ar fellas zzaaf n Oebbi, ma issawel ed tidep
A lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S! Oebbi, s tidep, Issuruf, d Bab n uuwab
